00141 static inline int mdc_prep_elc_req(struct obd_export *exp,
00142                                    struct ptlrpc_request *req, int opc,
00143                                    struct list_head *cancels, int count)
00144 {
00145         return ldlm_prep_elc_req(exp, req, LUSTRE_MDS_VERSION, opc, 0, cancels,
00146                                  count);
00147 }
00148 
00149 static inline unsigned long hash_x_index(__u64 hash, int hash64)
00150 {
00151         if (BITS_PER_LONG == 32 && hash64)
00152                 hash >>= 32;
00153         /* save hash 0 with hash 1 */
00154         return ~0UL - (hash + !hash);
00155 }
